description: Situated in a residential area, 2 km from Karlovy Vary’s spa centres, Pension Rainbow offers spacious rooms with free Wi-Fi and a garden. Facilities include a winter terrace and a restaurant that serves breakfast and a complimentary welcome drink is also provided. Guests have access to a dining room where there is a fridge with drinks for purchase, a kettle and a large selection of tea, a coffee maker including coffee, a microwave oven, a toaster and an electric grill. Its rooms have en suite bathrooms. Welcome tea and coffee is offered for guests. Breakfast is served daily and includes freshly baked bread, pastries and homemade jams. Guests at Rainbow Hotel can relax in the winter garden, or with good weather, enjoy the sun in the well kept summer garden, with barbecue, sun loungers and table tennis. The private car park can be used free of charge. A local bus stop is 100 metres away.

name: Pension U Vlasku
description: Located 5 km from the centre of Karlovy Vary, Pension U Vlášků features an indoor pool, a restaurant and free WiFi access. The rooms have a seating area with a radio and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a minibar, a basic kitchenette and a bathroom with a bathtub or a shower. Linen and towels are provided. Breakfast is offered in the morning and other meals can be enjoyed in the guest house's restaurant. Guests can relax in a shared lounge, play darts, get some fresh air in a garden or visit the sights of Karlovy Vary, with the Mill Colonnade and the Hot Spring being within a 15-minute drive away. Karlovy Vary International Airport is 11.5 km from U Vlášků Pension and public parking can be found nearby.

name: Penzion Pavel
description: Situated in Karlovy Vary and within 4.5 km of Mill Colonnade, Penzion Pavel has a terrace, non-smoking rooms, and free WiFi. The property is around 4.6 km from Market Colonnade, 4.6 km from Hot Spring and 25 km from Castle and Chateau Bečov nad Teplou. The guest house features family rooms. At the guest house, rooms have a wardrobe, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. The rooms come with a coffee machine, while certain rooms come with a balcony and others also boast mountain views. The rooms will provide guests with a outdoor furniture and a kettle. Fichtelberg is 30 km from Penzion Pavel, while Colonnade by the Singing Fountain is 47 km from the property. The nearest airport is Karlovy Vary International Airport, 9 km from the accommodation.

name: Eurohotel Garni
description: The Eurohotel Garni is located not far from the business and spa center of Karlovy Vary. Our very stylish building offers bright and comfortable accommodation with its own garden and the free car park (watched by a video-camera). Free Wi-Fi access is also provided. All en-suite rooms at the Eurohotel are fitted with a TV with satellite channels and a mini bar. Seating facilities are available in each. Freshly prepared buffet breakfast is served in the hotel breakfast room every morning. In the center of Karlovy Vary you will find spa colonnades with hot healing springs, a 10-minute ride away, and architectural sights, including Baroque and Art Nouveau historical buildings.

name: Penzion Fan
description: Situated in the Bohatice area of Karlovy Vary, Penzion Fan is a 20-minute walk from the Horni Nadrazi Train Station, and offers accommodations with a flat-screen satellite TV. There are 2 golf clubs within 5 km from the property. All en-suite studios come with a kitchenette, fridge and electric water kettle, as well as Wi-Fi for free. There is a build-in wardrobe in the hallway and outside roller blinds. The beds have anti-allergic pillows and blankets. Guests can rent a hairdryer, as well as card and board games, at the reception. Tickets for the local bus transport are available as well. Parking in a lockable yard is available for free. Karlovy Vary Airport is 7 km from Penzion Fan. A shopping centre and a market place are 2.5 km away.

name: Spa Hotel Imperial
description: Built in the early 1900s, Hotel Imperial is a well-known landmark in Karlovy Vary. Its award-winning spa centre offers an indoor pool, and the restaurant hosts cooking shows. Rooms here come with a satellite TV, a minibar and free internet access. There is a small seating area in each room. National cuisine is served at the non-smoking restaurant. Café Vienna offers traditional desserts and coffee specialities. In the evening, live music and cocktails are offered at the Imperial Club. Spa therapies at the Imperial include carbon dioxide baths and beauty treatments. There is a hot tub, sauna and fitness room. Bathrobes and slippers are included in the price. Other services offered at the property include a hairdresser`s, manicure and pedicure, as well as the possibility to book trips. There are 4 tennis courts which can be booked at the sports centre. Guests can also rent bikes and helmets or book Nordic Walking directly at the hotel.

name: A.Dalia
description: This charming familiar boarding house in Karlovy Vary is set amidst an attractive park-style garden with a little pond and offers you fully equipped double and triple rooms. Situated in the immediate vicinity of Karlovy Vary's spa facilities and the Collonade and about 500 metres from the town centre, the A.Dalia boarding house is an ideal base for a relaxing stay in this world-famous spa town.

name: Pension Family
description: Situated in Karlovy Vary, within 1.1 km of Mill Colonnade and less than 1 km of Market Colonnade, Pension Family features accommodation with a garden and free WiFithroughout the property as well as free private parking for guests who drive. Boasting family rooms, this property also provides guests with a sun terrace. The guest house provides quiet street views and an outdoor fireplace. The rooms at the guest house are fitted with a seating area, a flat-screen TV with streaming services and a private bathroom with a hair dryer and a shower. Rooms are fitted with a kettle, while certain rooms come with a kitchen with a microwave, a fridge and kitchenware. At Pension Family the rooms come with bed linen and towels. The accommodation offers a picnic area. Guests at Pension Family will be able to enjoy activities in and around Karlovy Vary, like skiing, cycling and hiking. Popular points of interest near the guest house include Hot Spring, Church of St. Mary Magdalene and Church of St. Peter and Paul. The nearest airport is Karlovy Vary International Airport, 4 km from Pension Family.

name: Ehila
description: Located in the spa town of Karlovy Vary Spa Town, 2 km from the centre, Ehila provides free private parking, free WiFi and a spa area with a sauna and a hot tub. The front desk is opened for 24 hours. All units at Ehila offer a TV with satellite channels, a kitchenette and a private bathroom with a shower. Various grocery shops and restaurants can be found in the centre. The spa colonnade is 3 km away.

name: La Bohemia Karlovy Vary
description: La Bohemia Karlovy Vary is conveniently located in the popular Near Center area. Offering a variety of facilities and services, the property provides all you need for a good night's sleep. All the necessary facilities, including free Wi-Fi in all rooms, gift/souvenir shop, taxi service, ticket service, kitchen, are at hand. Comfortable guestrooms ensure a good night's sleep with some rooms featuring facilities such as flat screen television, carpeting, cleaning products, clothes rack, complimentary instant coffee. The property offers various recreational opportunities. Friendly staff, great facilities, and close proximity to all that Karlovy Vary has to offer are three great reasons you should stay at La Bohemia Karlovy Vary.Agoda

name: Pension Villa Maria
description: Situated in a quiet residential area of Karlovy Vary, 300 metres above the Collonade, the Pension Villa Maria offers free wired internet access and free parking. The rooms at the Villa Maria feature modern furniture and an elegant, private bathroom with a heated towel rail and a glass shower. They are equipped with an electric kettle, a CD and a DVD player and a refrigerator. Reservations for medical treatments at the Alžbětiny Lázně spa can be made at the guest house. A bus service to the spa is available. Manicure can be done in your room. Within a 50-metre radius you can find 4 restaurants, 2 grocery stores and a pharmacy. Karlovy Vary Airport is 5 km away.

name: Penzion Valkoun-Lilienfeld
description: A 5-minute walk from the Colonnade, the newly renovated Penzion Valkoun offers views of the Tepla River and elegantly furnished rooms with parquet floors and stylish bathrooms. Free Wi-Fi is available in the entire building and free parking is possible on site. The next bus stop is just 50 metres away. All rooms come equipped with a flat-screen satellite TV, a kettle and a fridge. Apartments feature a fully equipped kitchenette.

name: Dubina
description: Situated in Kyselka and with Mill Colonnade reachable within 14 km, Dubina features a tour desk, allergy-free rooms, a private beach area, free WiFithroughout the property and water sports facilities. Boasting family rooms, this property also provides guests with a sun terrace. There is a restaurant serving European cuisine, and free private parking is available. At the guest house, each room has a desk. Rooms include a private bathroom fitted with a shower and a hair dryer, while certain rooms have a kitchenette equipped with a fridge. At Dubina each room includes bed linen and towels. A continental breakfast is available each morning at the accommodation. Dubina offers an outdoor fireplace. Activities such as skiing, cycling, hiking can be enjoyed in the surroundings, and guests can relax along the beachfront. Market Colonnade is 14 km from the guest house, while Hot Spring is 14 km from the property. The nearest airport is Karlovy Vary International Airport, 10 km from Dubina.

name: Aphrodite Suite Hotel Karlovy Vary
address: 38 Ivana Petrovice Pavlova, 360 01 Carlsbad, Carlsbad Region
description: No description found

name: Pension Escrime
description: Located in the quiet Růžový vrch part of Karlovy Vary, Pension Escrime is a 15-minute walk from the city centre. It offers free Wi-Fi and free public parking. A fitness centre can be used at an additional cost. The Escrime Pension’s modern, colourfully decorated rooms feature a seating area, a TV, an electric kettle with coffee and tea, and a bathroom. Karlovy Vary Airport is 9 km away, with a transfer service available on request and at an additional cost. Horní Nádraží Train Station is an 8-minute walk away, and it is 19 km to the Jáchymov Ski Area.

name: Villa Anastazis - Penzion Eden
description: Villa Anastazis - Penzion Eeden is located in a quiet area of Karlovy Vary, 3 bus stops from the centre of the resort and offers you en-suite rooms with flat-screen TV and refrigerator. You can enjoy river or garden views from your room. Free WiFi is available. At Villa Anastazis - Penzion Eden you will find a terrace and a snack bar. Other facilities offered include a shared lounge. The property offers free parking. A pool centre, a hockey stadium and a sports areal can be found only 300 metres away. Meeting and business facilities are offered for a surcharge and upon a prior request. The guest house is a 5-minute walk away from the Karlovy Vary Golf Course and from the Ice Hockey Arena. The U Draka restaurant is 400 meters away and a supermarket can be reached on foot in 10 minutes.

name: Vila Anton
description: Situated right next to the pedestrian zone in the historical centre of Carlsbad, Vila Anton is a 5-minute walk from Alžbětiny Lázně Spa Centre, to which guests are given a discount. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the property. Vila Anton’s rooms look out onto the garden and are equipped with satellite TV, which has international channels, and a small seating area. All rooms have their own private bathroom and toilet. Each room is located on separate floor and is equipped with its own kitchen. The hotel serves continental and full English breakfasts, has a sun terrace, children’s playground and barbecue facilities, and offers massages and tours. Shared kitchen facilities are available to guests. Natural springs are located 500 metres from the property. The Carlsbad Dolní Nádraží Train Station is 1.5 km from the Anton, while the main bus station can be reached in 5 minutes on foot.

name: Pension Rak
description: Pension Rak is quietly located in Karlovy Vary, 300 metres from the centre. A common kitchen with a fridge and kitchenware is at guests' disposal. The garden has a seating area and the terrace on the first floor offers views of Mount Klinovec. Continental breakfast is served every morning. All rooms come with a private bathroom with shower and they are decorated in yellow, green and pink colours. Within 300 metres there are restaurants, a children's playground and the Alzbetiny spa with treatments and a swimming pool. Hiking trails are only a 5-minute walk from the Rak. Golf can be played in Cihelny, 6 km away, or Hurky, 5 km from the guest house. Pension Rak is 300 metres away from the bus station and 800 metres from Karlovy Vary Train Station. Transport services are offered upon request.

name: Guesthouse 'Malena'
description: Set in Karlovy Vary and within 600 metres of Mill Colonnade, Guesthouse "Malena" has a garden, allergy-free rooms, and free WiFithroughout the property. The property is around 22 km from Castle and Chateau Bečov nad Teplou, 33 km from Fichtelberg and 49 km from Colonnade by the Singing Fountain. The property is non-smoking and is situated 400 metres from Market Colonnade. At the guest house, all rooms have a desk. Guesthouse "Malena" offers some units with mountain views, and all rooms are fitted with a kettle. All guest rooms feature a shared bathroom, slippers and bed linen. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Hot Spring, Church of St. Mary Magdalene and Church of St. Peter and Paul. The nearest airport is Karlovy Vary International, 4 km from Guesthouse "Malena", and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Retro Riverside Wellness Resort
description: Hotel Retro Riverside Wellness Resort is set in Březová, near the forest and the water dam and offers free WiFi, a restaurant serving international cuisine, and spa and wellness facilities free of charge. The spa and wellness area provides pools, 5 different types of sauna, a hot tub and fitness centre. All suites comprise air conditioning, a balcony and a flat-screen TV with cable and satellite channels. Each unit has a private bathroom with a bathtub or a shower. Staromlýnská Bus Stop is 1 km away. The popular spa town of Karlovy Vary is at a distance of 8 km. Bečov n. Teplou Castle is 15.4 km from the Riverside Retro.

name: Kranio
description: No description found

name: Rubin Luxury Apartments
description: Offering a terrace, Rubin Luxury Apartments is situated in Karlovy Vary, 100 metres from Mill Colonnade. Market Colonnade is 300 metres away. Free WiFi is offered throughout the property. All units include a flat-screen TV, coffee machine, washing machine, tumble dryer and Apple TV. Some units have a seating area and/or balcony. There is also a kitchen, equipped with a dishwasher and oven. Each unit has a private bathroom with bathrobes and slippers. Rubin Luxury Apartments also includes a spa centre, saunas and relax zone. Hot Spring is 400 metres from Rubin Luxury Apartments. The nearest airport is Karlovy Vary International Airport, 3 km from the property.

name: Hotel Villa Golf Cihelny
description: Located in Karlovy Vary, 13 km from Castle and Chateau Bečov nad Teplou, Hotel Villa Golf Cihelny provides accommodation with a fitness centre, free private parking, a garden and a shared lounge. Among the facilities at this property are a shared kitchen and a concierge service, along with free WiFi throughout the property. Guests can use the spa and wellness centre with an indoor pool, sauna, and hot tub, as well as a restaurant. At the hotel, each room is fitted with a desk, a terrace with a mountain view, a private bathroom, a flat-screen TV, bed linen and towels. Guest rooms will provide guests with a wardrobe and a coffee machine. Guests at Hotel Villa Golf Cihelny can enjoy a buffet breakfast. The accommodation offers a hammam. The area is popular for hiking and cycling, and bike hire is available at Hotel Villa Golf Cihelny. Mill Colonnade is 13 km from the hotel, while Market Colonnade is 13 km away. The nearest airport is Karlovy Vary International Airport, 11 km from Hotel Villa Golf Cihelny.

name: Parkhotel and Congress Center Pilsen
address: U Borského parku 31, Pilsen, Plzeň Region
description: The Parkhotel Plzen Congress Center is located close to the beautiful Borský Park, in the southern area of the city of Plzen. You can easily reach the city centre and the commercial district of Borska Pole. Guests have free access to the fitness area and the outdoor swimming pool during summer. Free WiFi is provided in the lobby bar and air conditioning is available in public areas. The meeting rooms have capacity for 10 to 1000 people and feature latest audiovisual equipment. Guests can also play tennis on one of the 11 tennis courts next to the hotel.

name: Hotel Palace
description: Hotel Palace is located in the district of Roudna, a 5-minute walk from Pilsen's historical centre. It offers spacious rooms with free WiFi access and 2-metre wide beds. Reception services are provided by the sister hotel Roudna, which is about 30 metres away. The Roudna Hotel’s reception is open 24 hours. Free public parking is possible on the street during night hours. Daytime parking as well as parking in the hotel's fenced parking lot 30 metres from the hotel, are at an additional cost. Guests receive a discount to dine in the sister hotel Roudna's Steak Restaurant which serves Czech specialities, steaks from Argentine beef and 4 kinds of draft beer. There is also a variety of international dishes. Guests can enjoy wide selection of local and Argentinian wine. Palace Hotel is a partner of the Golf Park Plzen and offers you attractive discounts for the recently opened 18-hole high-quality golf course in Pilsen Dysina. You can also visit the famous Pilsner Urquell brewery and the zoo.

name: Restaurance A Pension U Salzmannu
description: In the centre of Pilsen, just beside the Cathedral of Saint Bartholomew, Penzion U Salzmannů features en-suite accommodations and a restaurant serving Czech cuisine. The rooms are set in a historic building from the 17th century and provide a bathroom, a TV and free WiFi. Breakfast is served every morning and the restaurant on site offers a summer terrace and local specialties. The main square of Pilsen is just 30 metres from Penzion U Salzmannů. A tram stop can be found opposite the house and the Plaza Shopping Center is reachable within 2 minutes by public transports. The Pilsen Train Station is 800 metres away.

name: Wellness Penzion U Gigantu
description: No description found

name: Astory Hotel
description: Hotel Astory Plzeň **** is located in Plzeň in the Pilsen region, 500 metres from Museum of West Bohemia and 600 metres from Doosan Arena. Featuring family rooms, this property also provides guests with a terrace. The accommodation provides a front desk service from 9:00 to 21:00, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. At the hotel, every room has a TV, mini fridge and a bathroom with a hairdryer. Some rooms have air conditioning. Guests at Hotel Astory Plzeň can enjoy a continental breakfast or relax in the hotel's café. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Cathedral of St. Bartholomew, Jiří Trnka Gallery and Josef Kajetán Tyl Theatre. The nearest airport is Karlovy Vary International Airport, 61 km from Hotel Astory Plzeň.

name: Avenue Pallova 28
description: Avenue Pallova 28 is set in Plzeň, 49 km from Teplá Monastery and 500 metres from Jiří Trnka Gallery. This 4-star hotel offers a shared lounge and a 24-hour front desk. Private parking is available on site. At the hotel, every room has a wardrobe and a flat-screen TV. With a private bathroom fitted with a shower and free toiletries, rooms at Avenue Pallova 28 also feature free WiFi, while some rooms also feature a city view. At the accommodation the rooms are equipped with bed linen and towels. A continental breakfast is available every morning at Avenue Pallova 28. Popular points of interest near the hotel include Doosan Arena, Cathedral of St. Bartholomew and Museum of West Bohemia. The nearest airport is Karlovy Vary International Airport, 69 km from Avenue Pallova 28.

name: Enjoy Inn
description: The Enjoy Inn hotel is situated in historical centre of Plzeň. It offers you a café, a sauna and massages can also be arranged. All rooms of the Enjoy Inn hotel feature free wireless internet access and a private bathroom. The property offers city tours. Airport shuttle can be arranged upon request and for an additional cost.

name: Penzion U Gigantu
description: No description found

name: Penzion V Zatacce
description: Situated in Plzeň, within 2.5 km of Museum of West Bohemia and 3.1 km of Main Railway Station, Penzion V Zatáčce features accommodation with free WiFithroughout the property. The property is around 3.1 km from University of West Bohemia, 3.2 km from Jiří Trnka Gallery and 3.2 km from Cathedral of St. Bartholomew. The guest house has family rooms. At the guest house, the rooms have a wardrobe, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. Penzion V Zatáčce offers some units with garden views, and every room is fitted with a kettle. All rooms at the accommodation are fitted with a seating area. Great Synagogue is 3.6 km from Penzion V Zatáčce, while Doosan Arena is 3.6 km from the property. The nearest airport is Karlovy Vary International Airport, 72 km from the guest house.

name: Apartmány U Gigantu
description: Located in Plzeň, 3.2 km from Museum of West Bohemia, Apartmány U Gigantu features views of the quiet street. The property is around 3.7 km from Main Railway Station, 3.8 km from University of West Bohemia and 3.9 km from Jiří Trnka Gallery. The guest house features family rooms. All units are equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, microwave, a kettle, a shower, free toiletries and a desk. With a private bathroom, rooms at the guest house also provide guests with free WiFi. At Apartmány U Gigantu every room is equipped with bed linen and towels. The accommodation offers a continental or vegetarian breakfast. Guests at Apartmány U Gigantu will be able to enjoy activities in and around Plzeň, like cycling and hiking. Cathedral of St. Bartholomew is 3.9 km from the guest house, while Great Synagogue is 4.3 km away. The nearest airport is Karlovy Vary International Airport, 73 km from Apartmány U Gigantu.

name: Hotel Plzen
description: Hotel Plzeň is located a 5-minute walk from the centre of Plzeň and offers 38 individually styled rooms, a fine restaurant, a common area with a fireplace and free WiFi. Guests can enjoy a complimentary welcome drink. Guests can choose from cozy and modernly furnished, quiet rooms for one to 4 people. A rich buffet breakfast is served in the property's restaurant to start off the day. Secured parking spaces in the yard for are available for an extra charge.

name: Chata louka
description: No description found

name: Ubytování Tajemství Lucy
address: 23 Na Jíkalce byt v přízemí, 301 00 Pilsen, Plzeň Region
description: Ubytování Tajemství Lucy provides a garden, as well as accommodation with free WiFi and a kitchenette in Skvrňany, 50 km from Teplá Monastery. A fridge and stovetop are also provided, as well as a kettle. Popular points of interest near the aparthotel include Museum Škoda Pilsen, Great Synagogue and Museum of West Bohemia. The nearest airport is Karlovy Vary International Airport, 70 km from Ubytování Tajemství Lucy.

name: Hotel Kapitol
address: Jaroslava Pruchy 1915/24, 434 01 Most, Ústí nad Labem Region
description: Situated in the town of Most and the Hnevin Castle reachable within 1 km, Hotel Kapitol offers air-conditioned accommodation, a restaurant, a 24-hour front desk, a indoor golf, a bowling, a terrace and a bar. Free WiFi is available in all areas and free private parking is possible on site. Each unit at Hotel Kapitol comes with a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a laptop safe, a minibar, an electric kettle, a telephone and a private bathroom with a shower, a hairdryer and free toiletries. Meals can be enjoyed in the on-site restaurant serving a traditional Czech cuisine as well as international dishes. Shops and a hairdresser are also located at the property. Other facilities offered at the property include a ticket service, a tour desk and luggage storage. An array of activities can be enjoyed on site or in the surroundings, including cycling.

name: Hotel Karlstejn & Spa
description: The Hotel Karlštejn enjoys an elevated position, 100 metres from the main square and 50 metres from Karlštejn Castle. It offers free WiFi and free monitored parking, a spa area and bike rental. Guest will be able to enjoy a free seasonal heated outdoor pool with salt water and exclusive castle views. All rooms at the Hotel Karlštejn offer views of the castle. They have a private bathroom, antique furniture and an LCD satellite TV. Aromatic coffee and other drinks can be enjoyed in the café bar. The restaurant has a summer garden and offers views of the castle. Guests can rent bicycles at the hotel or relax at the sauna and hot tub. A golf course can be found 2 km from the Hotel Karlštejn and an Aquapark can be reached within a 20-minute drive. Prague is 30 km away or a 30-minute train ride. The hotel offers a shuttle service on request.

name: Hotel Vaka
description: The new Hotel Vaka is located in a quiet area near the centre of Brno and close to the Královo Pole shopping mall and offers tastefully furnished modern rooms with kitchenettes. All rooms feature a small kitchenette with a microwave oven, a plasma satellite TV and a laptop-size safe. The city centre is reachable by car within 5 minutes (10 minutes by public transport) and the Brno Exhibition Centre within 10 minutes (25 minutes by public transport). Wireless internet access is available in the entire Vaka hotel free of charge. A complimentary buffet breakfast is served every morning and guests get a 10% discount in a nearby restaurant. About 5 minutes from the Hotel Vaka there is a sports and wellness centre and a large park. You can park your car for free on site.

name: Grandhotel Zvon
address: Nám. Premysla Otakara Ii. 90/28, České Budějovice, South Bohemia
description: Right on the historic main square of České Budějovice, Grandhotel Zvon is an elegant and stylish 4-star superior boutique hotel with a tradition dating back to 1533. It offers secure parking in a private garage, as well as free WiFi access. The spacious rooms at the Zvon Grandhotel are elegantly furnished with custom-made high-quality furniture and luxurious fabrics. Each room features a satellite TV, and a bathroom. Some rooms overlook the historic square. The Zvon restaurant serves classic Czech cuisine made from regional products. The hotel supplies beef, veal and lamb from its own organic farm. Guests can choose from a wide range of beers and of Moravian and Austrian wines.

name: Pytloun Flat Hotel
description: Located 13 km from Ještěd and 27 km from University of Applied Sciences Zittau/Goerlitz, Pytloun Flat Hotel provides accommodation in Liberec. Free WiFi is provided throughout the property and private parking is available on site. All units include a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, an equipped kitchen, a dining area, and a private bathroom fiitted with a hair dryer, while some rooms feature a terrace or a balcony. A dishwasher, an oven and fridge are also offered, as well as a kettle. Szklarki Waterfall is 47 km from the aparthotel, while Kamienczyka Waterfall is 47 km away. The nearest airport is Vaclav Havel Prague Airport, 122 km from Pytloun Flat Hotel.

name: Hotel U Kaplicky
description: The family-run Hotel U Kaplicky is a 10-minute walk from the Old Bridge in the historic royal town of Pisek. All rooms are en-suite and they come with wooden furniture and work desks. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the property. The restaurant serves traditional South Bohemian specialities as well as international cuisine. It has a smoker's area and there is a terrace as well. The forest is 500 metres away and there are cycling routes in the vicinity. The local bus stop is 30 metres from the property and the Main Train Station is 2 km away. Tennis courts can be found within 200 metres from the Hotel U Kaplicky while a swimming pool is 2 km away. Private parking is available on site for a surcharge of 200 CZK per night, as well as a lockable garage bike storage.

name: Penzion U Lucerny
description: No description found

name: Hotel Baltaci Atrium
description: Set in Zlin in south-eastern Moravia, Hotel Baltaci Atrium offers elegant, bright rooms with minibars, safes and LCD TVs with 20 channels. Free Wi-Fi and free parking is provided. The hotel features an onsite Café Atrium Restaurant. The Baltaci restaurant offers a wide range of high quality steaks as well as traditional Czech cuisine. There is a spa center where guests can enjoy relaxation in aroma steam bath and a dry Finnish sauna. The center is available for hotel guests free of charge in the evening hours.

name: Hotel U Zvonu
description: Located in the centre of Vrchlabi in the Krkonose Mountains, family-run Hotel U Zvonu provides beautiful and spacious accommodation. It offers free parking, a breakfast buffet and free internet access. Lunch and dinner are available at the restaurant of a sister hotel, only 100 metres away. Guests of the U Zvonu will receive a discount. Guests of the Hotel U Zvonu can enjoy services of spa centre in a partner hotel Gendorf nearby, which features a sauna, hot tubs, a solarium, herbal steam baths and a wide range of beauty treatments and massages.

name: Cosmopolitan Bobycentrum - Czech Leading Hotels
description: Situated in Brno, 2 km from Špilberk Castle, Cosmopolitan Bobycentrum - Czech Leading Hotels boasts a restaurant, bar and free WiFi throughout the property. Guests can enjoy a fitness centre at the property. Every room is fitted with a TV with satellite channels. Some rooms include a seating area where you can relax. Each room is equipped with a private bathroom equipped with a bath. For your comfort, you will find free toiletries and a hair dryer. Guests can dine in the on-site Bruno Café Restauran, serving local cuisine. Trade Fairs Brno is 3.3 km from Cosmopolitan Bobycentrum - Czech Leading Hotels, while Villa Tugendhat is 800 metres from the property. Brno–Turany Airport is 9 km away.

name: Hotel Mlynska
description: Set within the heart of Uherske Hradiste, this hotel features air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi, cable and satellite TV, minibars and safes. The tiled bathrooms are equipped with showers and hairdryers. The suites offer a bathtub as well. The restaurant serves a variety of Czech and international cuisine. Guests can park their car in the underground garage of the Mlynska. Hotel Mlynska is a good starting point to go cycling. The Theatre of Moravian Slovakia and the Museum of Moravian Slovakia (Slovacke Muzeum) can be visited as well.

name: Villa A. Malka
description: No description found

name: Pension Villa Stella
address: Kratka 125, Špindlerův Mlýn, Hradec Králové Region
description: Located in Špindlerův Mlýn, Pension Villa Stella offers free WiFi and on-site parking spaces. It also provides a garden with a terrace, and free ski storage. The non-smoking units at the Stella all come with a private bathroom, satellite channels and an electric kettle. In addition, the studios feature a fully equipped kitchenette. Guests at the Villa Stella can enjoy a daily breakfast buffet. Labská Water Dam is 2 km away, while Svatý Petr Ski Area can be reached within a 4-minute drive. Indoor parking is possible in a garage for surcharge.

name: Penzion U Kapitána
description: Located in Valtice and with Chateau Valtice reachable within 600 metres, Penzion U Kapitána provides a garden, non-smoking rooms, free WiFi and barbecue facilities. Featuring room service, this property also provides guests with a restaurant. Guests can enjoy garden views. At the guest house, each room includes a wardrobe and a flat-screen TV. At Penzion U Kapitána, all rooms are fitted with a hairdryer and free toiletries. A continental breakfast is available daily at the accommodation. The area is popular for hiking and cycling, and bike hire is available at Penzion U Kapitána. Colonnade na Reistně is 1.9 km from the guest house. The nearest airport is Brno–Turany Airport, 61 km from Penzion U Kapitána.

name: Wellness Pension 7
description: No description found

name: Avanti Hotel Brno
description: The Avanti hotel is located 200 metres from Brno's large Kralovo Pole shopping mall with a sports centre including swimming pools and fitness facilities. The hotel proposes a bowling alley as well as a wellness centre. Tasty Czech and international cuisine can be enjoyed in the restaurant and there is free internet access available throughout the entire Avanti hotel. Guests can enjoy a rooftop wellness free of charge. The wellness includes sauna, outside hot tub, fitness centre and relaxing room with a fireplace. The next tram station is 400 metres away. From there you can quickly get to the centre of Brno. The hotel offers free, private parking, which is under video surveillance.

name: Penzion Austis
description: No description found

name: Hotel Osvit
address: 17. listopadu 1478, 293 01 Mladá Boleslav, Central Bohemian Region
description: Hotel Osvit is set in Mladá Boleslav, 1.8 km from Skoda Auto car factory and 50 km from Prague. Free WiFi is featured throughout the property and free private parking is available on site. Every room includes a flat-screen TV, kitchen and private bathroom. Certain units have a seating area for your convenience. For your comfort, you will find free toiletries and a hairdryer. There is room service at the property. A number of supermarkets and restaurants can be found around the property. An array of activities are offered in the area, such as golfing and cycling. Bedřichov is 43 km from Hotel Osvit, while Poděbrady is 36 km away. Vaclav Havel Prague Airport is 59 km from the property.

name: Hotel Vista
description: The non-smoking Hotel Vista in Brno-Medlánky is a 10-minute ride by a direct tram from the city centre. It offers modern rooms, free internet and free parking (depends on availability). All rooms have a flat-screen satellite TV and a stylish bathroom with a heated towel rack. Asian-style wellness sauna is also available. The Vista Hotel is easily reachable from the motorway, and the Brno fairgrounds BVV can also be reached within 15 minutes from the hotel. An airport shuttle service is available on request. Guests enjoy 25% off the entry fee to the Wellness Kurim, 13 km from the hotel.

name: Smarthotel Nezvalova Archa
description: Smarthotel Nezvalova Archa offers a self-service accommodation concept. It is located near Olomouc Main Train Station and 1.5 km from the city centre. Check-in at the hotel is self-service via the Just IN Mobile app, or via an entry code that guests receive via SMS on the day of arrival. The JustIN Mobile check-in app can only be activated on the day of arrival after 12 pm. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the property. There is also a pay parking lot with limited capacity (cannot be reserved). All rooms at the hotel are air-conditioned. They are equipped with a kitchenette and a private bathroom with shower and free toiletries. Guests also have access to a private sauna for up to two people, which must be booked in advance. A continental breakfast is included each morning. There is a shared kitchen on the ground floor and a self-service bar where guests can purchase a wide range of drinks and snacks. Payment is via a self-service terminal. Olomouc Main Bus Station is 1.1 km from the property. The nearest airport is Leoš Janáček Airport, 62 km from Smarthotel Nezvalova Archa.

name: Penzion 4 Dvory
address: Husova Trida 37-91, České Budějovice, South Bohemia
description: Penzion 4 Dvory is set 20 minutes’ walking from the historical centre of České Budějovice and the Černá věž Tower and is provided with accommodation with free parking, a restaurant and garden with barbecue facilities. A table tennis is available in spring, summer and autumn. A sauna and a hot tub are available for a surcharge. The accommodation units are functionally furnished and feature private bathrooms with shower or bathtub and TVs. Most of them have a kitchen or kitchenette with dining area. Upon request, breakfast can be served at Penzion 4 Dvory and late dining is possible at the on-site restaurant. Several shops and restaurants can be reached within 5 minutes’ walking. Free parking is available in front of the building, as well as in the vicinity. The local bus stop U Parku is 30 metres from the property, and Hluboká nad Vltavou, with a zoo, a castle and golf course is 9 km away. The Unesco accredited town of Český Krumlov is 25 km away.

name: DHSR Centralni Lazne
address: Goethovo Namsti 1, 353 01 Mariánské Lázně, Carlsbad Region
description: Situated in Mariánské Lázně, 300 metres from Colonnade by the Singing Fountain, Ensana Centrální Lázně - Maria Spa features accommodation with a bar and private parking. This 4-star hotel offers room service, a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi. Guests can use the spa and wellness centre with an indoor pool, fitness centre, and sauna, as well as a restaurant. All rooms at the hotel are fitted with a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with free toiletries and a hairdryer. At Ensana Centrální Lázně - Maria Spa the rooms include bed linen and towels. The wellness area at the accommodation is comprised of a hot tub and a hammam. Bike hire and car hire are available at Ensana Centrální Lázně - Maria Spa and the area is popular for skiing and cycling. The Singing Fountain is 300 metres from the hotel, while Castle and Chateau Bečov nad Teplou is 23 km from the property. The nearest airport is Karlovy Vary International, 39 km from Ensana Centrální Lázně - Maria Spa, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Amenity Hotel & Resort Lipno
address: Lipno Nad Vltavou 999, 382 78 Lipno nad Vltavou, South Bohemia
description: Amenity Hotel & Resort Lipno is located in Lipno nad Vltavou right at the lake shore, with a beach situated in front of the hotel. Free WiFi access is available. The property offers two types of accommodation, hotel rooms and apartments. Hotel rooms come with a flat-screen TV, a minibar, bathrobe, slippers, free toiletries, and a private bathroom fitted with a bath or a shower. Certain rooms feature a balcony with lake views. Apartments then feature an outside seating area, living room, satellite TV, fully equipped kitchen, bathroom, tea and coffee making facilities and a safety box. Breakfast is served every morning. Guests can dine at the restaurant in the resort 100 metres away. The resort also features a wellness centre with a sauna, hot tub and steam bath, a fitness centre, a bowling alley, and a sports centre with facilities for tennis, squash, badminton and table tennis, as well as a climbing wall. All facilities in the resort can be used by hotel guests at a surcharge. In addition, guests can take advantage of a 20 metre-long salt-water swimming pool. It is accessible free of charge daily until 13:00 for guests staying at the hotel, chalet, apartment or Deluxe Villas. For other, access can be purchased at the property. Free parking is available on site. Amenity Hotel & Resort Lipno is situated 3 km from Lipno Treetop Walkway and 2 km from the Kramolín Ski Area.

name: Hotel Sharingham
description: Only a 5-minute drive from the Cathedral of St. Peter and Paul, Hotel Sharingham offers 2 on-site restaurants. Trams to Brno's centre stop 150 metres from the hotel. Rooms here come with a flat-screen satellite TV, free access to wired internet and a work desk. Each has its own, modern bathroom with complimentary toiletries. Italian and Czech dishes are served at the restaurant. Guests can also order a stone-oven pizza. Guests can reach the city centre within a 10-minute drive by public transport. Brno Exhibition Centre is 1 km away from Sharingham Hotel. Just 300 meters away is the Kajot Arena, an indoor ice hockey arena. Squash courts are located about a 5-minute walk from the hotel and an indoor pool is a 10-minute drive away. Construction work is taking place in the vicinity of our hotel, which is the responsibility of the city of Brno. We apologize for any noise.

name: Hotel Maria
description: Located in the centre of Ostrava, Hotel Maria is a family-run hotel that offers accommodation with free WiFi and cable TV. The spacious rooms of Maria Hotel offer a private bathroom. It is possible to book a massage on site. The hotel offers a 24-hour front desk service. Czech and international dishes are served at the Hotel Maria’s restaurant. The bar provides drinks and snacks. Breakfast is served every morning. Leos Janacek Airport is 20 km away.

name: Hotel Bedriska Wellness Resort & Spa
address: Bedrichov 50, Špindlerův Mlýn, Hradec Králové Region
description: Hotel Bedriska is located in the mountain resort of Spindleruv Mlyn, 400 metres from the Medvědín Ski Resort and a 10-minute walk from the town centre, and provides a wellness area. It is quietly situated and features a spacious garden with views of the Giant Mountains. Free WiFi is available. The property houses the restaurant ORANGE le MOON and a tennis court. Spa area including a pool, hot tub, Finnish sauna, steam sauna, relax zone and cooling program is also provided. Massages, a solarium and a wellness bar are offered as well. In summer, guests can unwind in the garden restaurant and a playground for children. The restaurant serves various international specialities, mainly prepared on the grill. A direct ski bus will take you from the hotel to the St. Peter Ski Resort which is located 1 km from the hotel. Between 1st May and 31st October, guests will daily receive a free return ticket for a cable car.

name: Hotel Art
description: Located in the centre of Písek, 50 metres from the Otava River and 300 metres from Kamenný Most Bridge, Hotel Art is situated in a historical building. Pisek Castle can be reached within a 5-minute walk. Hotel Art houses a restaurant that serves breakfast and dinner. Every day, guests at the hotel can enjoy a breakfast buffet. A bus stop can be reached within 200 metres. The Písek Train Station and an indoor swimming pool are a 2-minute drive away. Public parking spaces can be found 100 metres from the hotel and they are free of charge during evenings and weekends.

name: Hotel Bobr
address: Celakovského 4297, 430 01 Chomutov, Ústí nad Labem Region
description: Hotel Bobr is located in a quiet central part of Chomutov, right next to the city park. Recreational area of Kamencové jezero and Zoopark Chomutov are just a 5-minute walk away. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the property. Rooms come with a bathroom with a bathtub or a shower. This hotel provides a 3-star hotel accommodation. The city centre can be reached withing 400 metres. Chomutov - Město train station is just 500 metres away from the property. The main train station is located 1.8 km from Hotel Bobr.

name: Penzion Jasmín
address: Dr. Milady Horákové St. 379/15, 460 01 Liberec, Liberec Region
description: Featuring free wireless internet access in all areas, Penzion Jasmin is located in Liberec and provides comfortable accommodation. It is conveniently positioned for guests wishing to visit the area's popular attractions. Jasmín Penzion has panoramic city views, plus a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, laundry facilities and a shared kitchen. Guests are also welcome to relax in the guest house's garden. The rooms include a kitchen, a kitchenette, a private bathroom and have stunning views over the city. Hot drinks can be brewed with the available tea and coffee supplies, and savoured in the comfort of the room's sitting area. A satisfying breakfast is prepared every morning at Penzion Jasmín, and there are numerous restaurants and cafés close by. Penzion Jasmin is within walking distance of Liberec Town Hall. It is within a 20-minute stroll of Liberec Train Station, which allows for convenient access in and around Liberec.Revato

name: Brioni Suites
description: Set in Ostrava, Brioni Suites enjoys a central location on the famous and lively Stodolní Street, surrounded by restaurants and bars, and offers air-conditioned apartments with free WiFi. All spacious apartments feature luxurious furnishings, sound-proofed windows, living rooms with leather sofas, minibar inside and modern bathrooms. Some also feature a lounge chair or a pool table. Silesian Ostrava Castle is 2.5 km from the property and Ostrava Zoo Park can be reached within 4.5 km. Stodolní Train Station is 200 metres away.

name: Boromeum Residence
address: Špitálská 183/2, 500 01 Hradec Králové, Hradec Králové Region
description: The Boromeum residence offers tastefully furnished apartments with kitchenettes in a listed historic building, right in the Old Town of Hradec Králové. It features an on-site restaurant. Free Wi-Fi and wired internet connection, as well as satellite TV, are available in the apartments. Breakfast can be served in a partners hotel, 15 metres from the Boromeum Residence. Several other restaurants can be found only 200 metres away form the property. You can park your car free of charge at a nearby location and make use of a storage room for your bicycles. A laundry room is also available.

name: H7 Palace
description: Located in Prague, H7 Palace is set in 2 buildings; a Renaissance Revival palazzo from 19th century on Halkova Street and a functionalist building right behind it, both reconstructed in 2016 by a team of Italian architects and designers. The interiors are fitted with Italian custom-made furniture and original artwork. Certain rooms feature a seating area to relax in after a busy day. Each room has a private bathroom. A flat-screen TV with satellite channels is available. Guests can enjoy plush mattresses and silk and cotton linen. Prague National Museum is 400 metres from H7 Palace, while Wenceslas Square is 600 metres away. The nearest airport is Vaclav Havel Prague Airport, 17 km from the property.

name: Orea Spa Hotel Bohemia
description: Housed in a charming historic building, OREA Spa Hotel Bohemia Mariánské Lázně is located in the central part of Mariánské Lázně and offers newly established spa facilities. Choose from elegantly furnished rooms as well as from luxurious suites in our sister Orea Hotel Anglicky Dvur. The colonnade with the Singing Fountain and the healing springs are only 300 metres away. Indulge in various classic massages, reflexology, make use of curative treatments like inhalations, electrotherapy, paraffin packs and much more and treat yourself to a visit to the sauna. The lounge is ideally suited for small seminars, presentation, trainings and the like. The Bohemia hotel restaurant has a capacity of 150 seats and is open all day. Taste delicious Czech and international cuisine!

name: Design Pension Twenty
address: 34 Jirího Nám., 290 01 Poděbrady, Central Bohemian Region
description: No description found

name: Hotel Nikolas
description: Situated just 1 km away from Ostrava’s city centre, Hotel Nikolas offers spacious rooms with free Wi-Fi. Facilities include a bar and a restaurant that serves Czech and international cuisine. All rooms at Nikolas Hotel have hypo-allergenic mattresses, central heating and a private bathroom, which includes a hairdryer and shower or bathtub. They are all equipped with a satellite TV, and some also have air conditioning. The hotel also features a wellness area with a spa bath, infra red sauna and Kneipp path, available for a surcharge. Guests can benefit from a rich buffet breakfast, a 24-hour reception and free secured private parking or covered parking. The bars, restaurants and clubs in Stodolni Street are just 2 km away.

name: Maximus Resort
description: Opened in June 2012, Maximus Resort features the Infinit Maximus Wellness and Spa Centre with an aquatic and sauna world including massages, a swimming pool, a hot tub, a steam bath, Kneipp bath and an outdoor cooling pool, all available at a surcharge. Stylishly decorated, most units have a terrace or balcony with views of the surrounding landscape. Each en-suite room comes with a flat-screen TV and a minibar. Some also have a seating area or a separate living room. The property contains only a 4-star area. A buffet breakfast is served each morning in Maximus Resort. The property’s restaurant serves international cuisine, and also has a garden with barbecue facilities. Boat trips are available at Brno Dam, 200 metres away. There is also the hotel's beach bar Hribek, open from April to September. The Kaskáda Golf Course, a zoo, and the Přístaviště Bus Stop are all with 2 km. Brno city centre, the castles Špilberk and Veveří, and the Villa Tugendhat, which is famous for pioneering modern architecture in Europe, are all within a 15-minute drive. A shuttle service is available free of charge.

name: Residence Romanza
description: The elegant 4-star Residence Romanza is located in the centre of Marianske Lazne, 250 metres from the Spa Colonnade and Singing Fountain. This property offers 24 apartments, some with balcony or terrac. A rich buffet breakfast is served in the hotel's restaurant "Romeo & Juliet". A summer terrace and a private garden are also available. Relaxing massages, wellness services, and other spa procedures are offered at Residence Romanza. Free WiFi is provided. Tennis and racquetball courts, horseback riding trips and many other activities can be booked on site. The hotel features a private indoor garage for up to 9 vehicles. Many of the town's popular springs are within a 5-minute walk. The Mestsky Urad Bus Stop is 150 metres away.

name: Pytloun Self Check-in Hotel Liberec
description: Pytloun Self Check-in Hotel Liberec on the outskirts of Liberec, close to the I-35 expressway and only a 4-minute drive from the city centre. All rooms come with an LCD satellite TV, free coffee/tea set, as well as a private bathroom with a shower and free toiletries. This comfortable non-smoking hotel offers modern rooms, a friendly. Because of its central location, the Hotel Pytloun is an ideal starting point to explore the city of Liberec and the surrounding area.

name: Pytloun Wellness Hotel Harrachov
description: Situated 300 metres from the Harrachov Ski Resort with night skiing and a 15-minute walk from the town centre, Pytloun Wellness Hotel Harrachov features a restaurant with a summer terrace, serving breakfast and Czech cuisine. Guests receive the Harrachov Card for free. The Harrachov Card provides various benefits and discounts on attractions in the surroundings. All rooms come with an LCD satellite TV, free coffee/tea set, ironing facilities, as well as a private bathroom with a bathtub, hairdryer and free toiletries. All rooms overlook the surrounding countryside or slopes. Guests can relax playing billiard, table tennis, darts, or enjoy an evening drink in the bar. There is a children’s corner with toys available as well.

name: Hotel Stará Pekárna s privátním wellness
address: Námestí Ceských Bratrí 26/13, 460 05 Liberec, Liberec Region
description: Situated in Liberec, 13 km from Ještěd, Hotel Stará Pekárna s privátním wellness features accommodation with a garden, free private parking, a shared lounge and a terrace. With free WiFi, this 3-star hotel offers room service and a tour desk. Guests can have a drink at the bar. The rooms at the hotel are fitted with a seating area, a flat-screen TV and a safety deposit box. Rooms include a kettle and a private bathroom with a shower and free toiletries, while certain rooms have a kitchen fitted with a fridge. At Hotel Stará Pekárna s privátním wellness each room includes bed linen and towels. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a buffet or a continental breakfast. Hotel Stará Pekárna s privátním wellness offers a children's playground. Guests at the hotel will be able to enjoy activities in and around Liberec, like skiing and cycling. University of Applied Sciences Zittau/Goerlitz is 26 km from Hotel Stará Pekárna s privátním wellness, while Szklarki Waterfall is 46 km from the property. The nearest airport is Vaclav Havel Prague Airport, 122 km from the accommodation.

name: Apartmány Terasy Café
description: Apartmány Terasy Café is set in Liberec, 1.4 km from ZOO Liberec. Ještěd is 7 km from the property. There is an onsite wellness centre with saunas, as well as a private garage parking, a café and a wine bar designed in Tuscan style. All units come with a seating area, terrace and/or balcony. There is also a fully equipped kitchen, as well as a private bathroom with a bath or shower in each unit. Towels are provided. There is a ski and bike storage including ski dryers and maintenance tools at the property. A charging station for electric cars is available for a surcharge and must be booked in advance. Centrum Babylon Liberec is 1.5 km from Apartmány Terasy Café.

name: Archivní Vinné Sklepy Penzionu Venuse
description: Archivní vinné sklepy penzion Venuše features a restaurant serving Czech cuisine, a 5-minute walk from the centre of Mikulov. The guest house comes with a wine cellar and tastings of regional and international wines are organised on site. Free Wi-Fi is provided. The rooms feature a seating area and a TV. A bathroom with a shower is available in each room. During summer, you can dine on the on-site terrace. Playground is provided for the children’s entertainment. You can unwind while playing darts and enjoying a drink at the bar. Free public parking is possible in front of Archivní vinné sklepy penzion Venuše. The Mikulov Castle is 700 metres away and the closest bus station Pavlovska can be reached within 5 minutes on foot.

name: Art Deco Hotel Hoffmann
address: ul. Josefa Hoffmanna 1533, 272 01 Kladno, Central Bohemian Region
description: Art Deco Hotel Hoffmann is set in a protected building of Kladno’s centre and just 300 metres from the town’s castle. It offers rooms with free internet access and a rich buffet breakfast. Access to the hotel and rooms is secured by electronic security locks. After payment, generate an entry PIN in app.myalfred.cz Satellite TV is standard in all rooms. Each has an en suite bathroom with toiletries and a hairdryer. A PC with free internet access is also available by the lobby. Ruzyne Airport is 15 km away from Hoffmanm Hotel Art Deco. There are restaurants and public transport options within 100 metres from the hotel.

name: Penzion Rotunda
description: No description found

name: Wellness Hotel Fénix
description: Situated in Liberec, 7.1 km from Ještěd, Wellness Hotel Fénix features accommodation with a garden, free private parking, a shared lounge and a terrace. With free WiFi, this 4-star hotel offers a kids' club and room service. Some units at the property have a balcony with a city view. At the hotel, the rooms are fitted with a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. Selected rooms also boast a kitchenette with a fridge and a microwave. All rooms include a wardrobe. Guests at Wellness Hotel Fénix can enjoy a continental breakfast. The accommodation offers a children's playground. The area is popular for skiing, and ski equipment hire is available at Wellness Hotel Fénix. Speaking Czech, German and English at the reception, staff are always at hand to help. University of Applied Sciences Zittau/Goerlitz is 30 km from the hotel, while Szklarki Waterfall is 50 km from the property. The nearest airport is Vaclav Havel Prague Airport, 122 km from Wellness Hotel Fénix.

name: Brioni Boutique Hotel 4
description: Brioni Boutique Hotel is located in the pedestrian zone, in the heart of Ostrava. It features air-conditioned rooms with a minibar, cable TV and free high speed WiFi of 150 MBit/s. A modern cedar wood sauna, a steam bath a are at guests’ disposal. Brioni Boutique Hotel provides secured parking for guests at an extra charge.

name: Wellness Hotel La Passionaria
description: The non-smoking Residence La Passionaria features spacious accommodation with free Wi-Fi. It is a 5-minute walk from the spa park in Marianske Lazne. Free camera-surveilled parking is available on site and 100 metres away is a casino. Holistic spa treatments, massages as well as medical examination are offered. Tennis courts are within 100 metres from the La Passionaria and the swimming pool is 500 metres away. A ski slope with artificial snow and night skiing is 1.5 km away and cross-country ski runs are 3.5 km from the guest house. Cycling, hiking and Nordic walking, as well as horseback riding are available within 2 km radius. Guests can visit the Kladska Nature Reserve or the Chodova Plana Beer Spa, which are 10 km away.

name: Hotel Pecr Well
address: Pec Pod Snežkou 344, 54221 Pec pod Sněžkou, Hradec Králové Region
description: Located in the centre of Pec pod Sněžkou, 600 metres from a ski lift and a nearby cable car to the Sněžka Mountain, Hotel Pecr offers a spa area with saunas and hot tubs available to guests for a discounted price. Free WiFi is provided. A ski bus stop is 50 metres away. The apartments provide a balcony, mountain views, 2 flat-screen satellite TVs, a sofa, and a fully equipped kitchenette with dishwasher and microwave. The bathroom comes with a bath tub, a hairdryer and free toiletries. Furthermore, there is Panorama wellness located on the roof. It offers 5 saunas, 2 hot tubs and other facilities. Hotel Pecr also features a restaurant. Other facilities offered on site include a lounge, a ski storage room and a ski school with ski rental. One free garage parking place is available for each apartment.

name: Pension Jitrenka Hrensko
address: Hřensko 123, 407 17 Hřensko, Ústí nad Labem Region
description: Situated in Hřensko, 8 km from Saxon Switzerland National Park, Pension Jitřenka Hřensko features accommodation with a shared lounge, free private parking and a terrace. With free WiFi, this 3-star hotel offers an ATM and a concierge service. The accommodation provides a tour desk, luggage storage space and currency exchange for guests. At the hotel, rooms are equipped with a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. Rooms have a safety deposit box, while some rooms have a balcony and others also boast mountain views. All rooms will provide guests with a fridge. Guests at Pension Jitřenka Hřensko can enjoy a buffet breakfast. Guests at the accommodation will be able to enjoy activities in and around Hřensko, like hiking and cycling. Königstein Fortress is 17 km from Pension Jitřenka Hřensko, while Pillnitz Castle and Park is 38 km from the property. The nearest airport is Dresden Airport, 77 km from the hotel.

name: Hotel Pod Jasany
address: Horní 213, 543 51 Špindlerův Mlýn, Hradec Králové Region
description: Located amid the Krkonošsky National Park, Hotel Pod Jasany is only 1 km from the centre of the ski resort Špindlerův Mlýn. It offers a wellness centre. All rooms and apartments provide a bathroom, satellite TV and a safe. The suites offer views of the adjacent ski slopes and tea/coffee making facilities. Free Wi-Fi is available in the entire hotel. Le Petit Gourmand, Hotel Pod Jasany’s restaurant, serves international and Czech specialities, accompanied with French and Moravian wines. The property provides buffet breakfast, afternoon snacks and 3-course dinners. Guests can relax in the club room featuring an open fireplace, or in the spa area, which provides a sauna, a hot tub, massages and a view of the surrounding mountains. In summer, the hotel’s terrace and the covered patio can also be used for barbecues. The parking area is camera-surveilled.

name: Pytloun Wellness Travel Hotel
description: Set amongst 17th century timber buildings, this hotel offers non-smoking rooms and a communal kitchen with an electric hob. It is located in Liberec, 4 km from Ještěd ski resort. All rooms come with a satellite TV, free coffee/tea set, as well as a private bathroom with a shower and free toiletries. Some apartments also have a private kitchenette. The front desk staff can help with queries such as conversion of foreign currencies. It provides storage facility for guests’ ski equipment. The Luxury Island Spa features an outdoor salt water pool, a Finnish sauna, an indoor tropical salt-herbal sauna, a hot tub and massages, all for a surcharge. Prior reservation at the spa is necessary. Pytloun Travel is 400 metres away from Liberec-Horní Ružodol Railway Station which provides easy access to the rest of Liberec. Guests can enjoy 30 minutes of free access to the spa between the hours of 9:00 - 14:00. It is necessary to reserve the spa in advance to avail the service.

name: Wellness Hotel Grand
address: Okruzni 183, Špindlerův Mlýn, Hradec Králové Region
description: Get 1 free ski pass for each booked room for every day of your staying in case of booking for at least 2 or more nights from 20.3. until the end of winter season. The Wellness Hotel Grand enjoys a central location in Spindlerův Mlýn and offers you modern rooms and fine cuisine. WiFi is available in all areas and is free of charge. You can enjoy superb views over the town centre and towards the scenic Giant Mountains from the Wellness Hotel Grand. Guests staying for two and more night have a 60-minute access to the hotel's wellness centre.

name: Pension Mona
description: No description found

name: Parkhotel Harrachov
description: The Parkhotel Harrachov can be found in Rýžoviště in Harrachov, just a few steps away from a slope to Čertova Hora, and features wellness facilities and a kids' and games room. Guests can taste regional and international cuisine in the restaurant or - weather permitting - on the panorama terrace. The wellness facilities of the Parkhotel Harrachov include a Finnish sauna, an infra sauna and various massages. Children can have fun in a kid's games room or outside on a children's playground.

name: Hotel Paradies
address: Laubeho Nám 258/4, Teplice, Ústí nad Labem Region
description: Set in a historical building from the 18th century, 100 metres from the centre of the spa town of Teplice, Hotel Paradies provides en-suite rooms with satellite TV and a safe. A buffet breakfast is served every morning. Guests can also dine on the summer terrace. Teplice is located in the Ore Mountains, 20 km from the German border. The ski area of Bournak is 15 km away and Klinovec is 50 km from the Paradies Hotel. Guests can unwind at the spa centre, which is 100 metres away from the Paradies, or at the Botanical Gardens, 2 km from the property. Doubravka Castle is 2 km away. Free parking with video surveillance is available on site.

name: Rezidence Villa Gloria
description: The fully renovated historic Rezidence Villa Gloria can be found in the picturesque area of the Forest Source of Marianske Lazne and offers you nice views of the forest and the spa parks. Most of the rooms in the Rezidence Villa Gloria feature a balcony. The rich and healthy buffet breakfast can be enjoyed in the quiet dining room or on the charming garden terrace. Free WiFi available in all areas of the hotel. Rooms and apartements include kitchenette. Property offers Wellness & Spa and a fitness corner. About 200 metres away you can find tennis courts. The Colonnade is reachable within a 15-minute walk and if you enjoy dancing, then pay a visit to the Lunapark café, which is just 300 metres away. Hotel parking is available on site and for a surcharge.
